title: Don't brag about how hard you are. It's not popular now
body:
In the past two days, there was a passage from Jiang Xun that I had always liked. Copy it in a small notebook.
"All aesthetics of life aims to resist the word busy. Busy is the death of the soul. Don't be busy any more - you will begin to have aesthetics of life."
At the end of the year when everyone was complaining about being busy and tired, I couldn't help typing out the following.
Everyone is busy, "busy" seems to have become a synonym for "meaning". If I am very free today, and Wang Laosan sends out the words "I can only sleep four hours a day until midnight" in his circle of friends, then I seem to be far behind him.
If other people get up early to catch a plane, don't sleep at night, and get to know friends and expand contacts while drinking and preparing, but I just drink tea and read books at home, will I be degenerated. This is the inner problem of many people.
Unknowingly, he threw away his comfortable lifestyle and held his glasses everywhere to find another lifestyle.
To tell the truth, there are many desperate Saburo and Sanniang in my vision. I admit that their enthusiasm for struggle has played a lot of free chicken blood for me. They are desperate. Their eyes are bright. Any "state" is already the best inspirational chicken soup.
But I'm sorry, I'm getting more and more tired of this kind of behavior. If you really enjoy working overtime, really indulge in regular fever and headache, and really immerse in the superiority of "no time", then I can only say: you are sick.
The pursuit of most normal people is spiritual relaxation and happiness. At least it must not be fatigue like a dog sticking out its tongue. But is it too unsightly for someone to whitewash his rough life with the word "hard force" every day?
The poison radiation of contemporary success studies is too wide. One of them is that it makes many people feel that a successful person is a busy person who has no time. Therefore, if I am busy every day, I am about equal to a successful person.
Don't deceive yourself. The above assumption may also be equivalent to "you are stupid and inefficient; or most of the decisions you make are wrong, and you can only continue to remedy & detours."
Compared with those who work hard in the noise every day and beat themselves like a top, I now appreciate those who live with great relaxation and ease. For example, some friends will fly to Europe for a month after a month of intensive work; Or push off several shiny "small opportunities" and stay at home for days without washing your face or socializing;
I have a very good friend who works in the CCTV news channel. She wishes she could work overtime every day without holidays. But one day, she exposed a beautiful oil painting in her circle of friends. She said that she had signed up for a weekend oil painting class to learn. I loved her very much at once. Like me, she especially disliked the seemingly "tall" situation of deliberately making friends. No matter how good the opportunity was, she wouldn't go to the people and adjustments she didn't like;
And my special friend yangshanshan, whose life is also very enjoyable. In the model circle, he has never been affected by flashy habits, never tried hard to gather resources and create popularity, and exhausted himself. She once told me that people can decide what they see and hear. I choose not to touch some things because I think I may be adversely affected.
People devote themselves to their own clothing design, like retro style to immerse in the end. The attitude towards life is really to let things be as they are. It is very natural and unrestrained. If you have the opportunity to travel and see the world, you can still do a small business. A few days ago, I found that she had taken her new clothes to Paris for shooting while playing.
Didn't they work hard? But they don't enjoy life?
I can never finish my work. My career can grow day by day, but is it really a good thing to continue to expand?
I still remember when we went to Greece the year before last, the guide told us that a group of big Chinese bosses went to a local wine cellar to talk about cooperation with them. How many boxes of wine they bought every year was rejected by the owner of the wine cellar. They said that we only made so much wine every year, but we didn't do so much. If there were too many, I wouldn't have time to go to the bar to travel.
Not only that, the cellar owner also introduced this group of big bosses who were stupid and rich to the neighboring cellar owners.
This is not stupid. It's just that you don't make money yourself. You also take the initiative to send money to your competitors.
Unfortunately, this is just the Chinese way of thinking.
Now there are too many organizations that fight chicken blood, but which one is better? title: Successful people know how to endure, while unsuccessful people know how to escape
body:
Why is it that no matter how difficult a boss is, he will not give up easily? And an employee wants to escape if he doesn't do well?
Why is it that no matter how much a couple quarrels and conflicts, they will not divorce easily? And a couple often separate for some small things?
In the final analysis, how much you put into a thing or a relationship determines how much pressure you can bear, how much success you can achieve, and how long you can stick to it.
Fenglun said: greatness comes from boiling. Why boil?
Because you have to bear the grievances that ordinary people can't bear. Ordinary people need others to understand, comfort and encourage, but you don't. ordinary people vent their emotions by resisting negative accusations, but you must see love and light and learn to transform and digest everything. Ordinary people need a shoulder to lean on when they are vulnerable, and you are the shoulder that others rely on.
Xiaozhuang said to Kangxi, "grandson, the biggest crisis of the Qing Dynasty is not the thousands of troops outside. The biggest crisis is in your own heart."
Insight: the most difficult thing is not the rejection and incomprehension of others, but whether you are willing to make changes for your dreams!
Life is always realistic... The poor use the cliff to do everything, and the rich use the cliff to bungee jump. This is the difference between the rich and the poor.
Disciple asked: Shifu, you sometimes beat and swear at others, sometimes you are polite and polite to others. Is there any mystery in this?
Master said: treat the superior directly to the hearts of the people, you can beat or scold him, and treat him in his true face; The most common metaphor for treating middle-class people is that they should be measured. They can't stand beating and scolding; Treat the lower class with a smile and hands folded. He is very fragile and small-minded. He is only treated with secular etiquette.
Sentiment: what kind of grievance you have suffered determines what kind of person you can become!
A person who can't swim can't solve the problem by changing the swimming pool; A person who can't do things can't solve his own problems by changing jobs; A man who doesn't know how to manage love can't solve the problem by changing his boyfriend and girlfriend; A person who doesn't know how to run a family can't solve the problem by changing his lover; A person who does not understand workplace ethics will never continue to succeed; No matter how much medicine you take or how well the hospital equipment is, a person who does not know how to maintain good health cannot solve the problem.
I am the root of everything. If you want to change everything, you must first change yourself! Learning is the foundation to change yourself.
In fact, you love yourself; What you like is yourself. What you love, what you hate, is yourself. When you change, everything changes. Your world is created by you. You created everything about you.

title: Multichain 心得
body:
**主持人：Alex，嘉宾：Mandy_Z**

【简介】

团队的愿景是将Multichain打造web3.0的终极路由器

Multichain是致力于支持跨链互动的基础设施。目前，我们已部署2200+跨链桥，这样各种资产与NFT可以在我们所支持的50多条主流链之间实现自由跨链。

发布了Co-mint跨链解决方案，Co-mint支持不同跨链桥铸造同一种资产，解决了流动性割裂问题的同时也提高了用户体验度

【特色】

和其它第三方跨链桥相比Multichain的特色

1. 非托管协议，由多方计算网络（MPC）提供安全支持
2. 为用户提供零滑点的跨链服务
3. Multichain路由能够使用户资产在任意链之间跨链，极大降低了跨链成本
4. 致力于推动多链生态的发展，深信多链是未来的发展趋势，为此我们建立了庞大的生态，以满足用户多种多样的跨链需求，目前我们已集成了50+条公链，提供了2200+多种跨链解决方案
5. 一直在不断升级改善跨链产品，提升安全等级，研发跨链创新方案，产品与技术是我们的优势。

【800多亿的总交易量，如何发展到该水平】

1. 跨链手续费最低，仅占总交易量的0.03%，这对于用户来说十分划算，而且针对稳定币的跨链交易，我们不收取任何手续费
2. 支持大额跨链交易，例如针对USDC的大额跨链，最大金额可以达到百万USDC，对于有大额跨链交易需求的用户来说，Multichain一步到位，在效率与成本上都具有优势
3. 建立之初就确保协议开源，经过长期代码审查，我们的安全性能经受住种种考验，让用户放心。
4. 一直在努力拓展生态，用户可以在我们的多链生态中自由快速地转移资产

【veMULTI ？】

veMULTI是针对multiDAO的管理方案。MULTI质押者可以获得veMULTI NFT

该NFT是MULTI质押者认领跨链手续费分红的凭证，与此同时，veMULTI NFT持有者还会获得针对DAO内部治理提议的投票权，参与社区治理

veMULTI NFT的能量由MULTI质押数量与锁定时长决定。MULTI质押者所得的跨链手续费收益每周将以USDC分发，因此MULTI不会有溢出，也就不会有稀释

veMULTI下一步计划？

2022年第二季度我们会向veMULTI持有者发放Multichain第一季度跨链手续费的分红

在了解社区成员的意愿后，我们也将在其它主流公链上部署veMULTI

关于Multichain社区治理的veMULTI投票系统也将在第二或第三季度上线，届时veMULTI 持有者将进一步参与社区的管理与运营

【不同之处】

veMULTI的设计参考了veCRV 和Solidly

1. 相较于前两者，veMULTI NFT是可以在NFT市场上自由交易。veMULTI NFT可以转换成其它ERC-20代币，这也为veMULTI持有者提供了灵活的退出渠道
2. 相比之下，MULTI质押者可以获得更高的年化收益，自上线以来，年化率保持在120%-160%
3. veMULTI NFT持有者所得收益是以USDC发放，而不是其他代币，这样持有者认领收益的过程更加简便低成本
4. veMULTI的治理权分配更加去中心化，我们重视每一个个体在社区治理中的权重

【安全吗？】

第一：我们在今年年初确实遇到了hack事件，但此次攻击是小概率，与我们的技术路线无关。为加强安全，我们已上线fastMPC 网络，进一步提高我们去中心化程度，同时我们与审计公司Immunefi 合作提出了赏金计划，另外我们也设立了安全基金。除了进行多方审计之外，我们自身也采取了一系列风险控制措施包括链上安全预警+定期资金检测等

title: What is CONNEXT ?
body:
# ทำความรู้จักกับ CONNEXT

วันนี้เราจะมาทำความรู้จักกับหนึ่งใน crosschain liquidity network ที่มีชื่อว่า CONNEXT กัน

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mbQz5h1QtDZhO6SFPCzoX.png?height=300&width=1201)

# What is Connext?

CONNEXT คือ cross-chain liquidity protocol ที่ผู้ใช้สามารถ transfers value ข้ามไป-มาระหว่าง EVM chain และ layer 2 ได้อย่างรวดเร็ว ง่าย ปลอดภัย และเป็น noncustodial อย่างสมบูรณ์อีกด้วย

ลองนึกภาพโลกที่ผู้ใช้ crypto สามารถเข้าถึง features ต่าง ๆ ของ crypto ecosystems ที่หลากหลายผ่านกระเป๋าเงินเใบเดียว โดยไม่จำเป็นที่จะต้องซื้อ native token ของแต่ละ ecosystem สิ่งนี้คืออนาคตที่ Connext กำลังสร้างอยู่

โดยวิสัยทัศน์ของ Connext คือการสร้างอนาคตของการถ่ายโอน Value บนอินเตอร์เน็ต โดยสิ่งนี้สามารถเป็นไปได้เมื่อผู้ใช้งานสามารถแลกเปลี่ยน Value ไป-มาได้อย่างง่ายดาย บนโลกของ crypto ที่มีระบบนิเวศน์ที่แตกต่างกัน

# Connext กับ The Interoperability Trilemma

The Interoperability Trilemma คือคุณสมบัติที่สำคัญ 3 ประการของ crosschain-protocol คือ Trustlessness , Extensibility , Generalizeability ซึ่งการที่จะทำให้ได้ครบทั้ง 3 ข้อนั้นมันแทบเป็นไปไม่ได้เลย ทาง Connext ได้เลือกแนวทางเดียวกับ Ethereum คือมุ่งเน้นไปที่ Trustlessness และ Extensibility ทำให้การทำงานของ Connext นั้น จะมีความปลอดภัยที่เทียบเท่ากับเชนต้นทางที่เราเริ่มต้น และสามารถที่จะต่อยอดไปยัง cryptosystems อื่น ๆ ได้ง่าย

แต่ทาง Connext ก็ไม่ได้ทิ้งหลัก Generalizeability ไป โดยทาง Connext นั้นได้เปิดให้ผู้พัฒนา สามารถมาพัฒนา dApps ต่าง ๆ บน technology ของทาง Connext เอง เพื่อที่จะให้ผู้ใช้สามารถส่ง value ต่าง ๆ ไป-มาระหว่างเชนได้ โดยที่ value ในที่นี้ ไม่ได้จำกัดอยู่แค่เพียงตัว Token เท่านั้น แต่ยังรวมไปถือ NFTs หรือแม้แต่การโหวต governance ข้ามเชน

# คุณสมบัติของ Connext

## Trustless

Connext นั้นแตกต่างจาก interoperability protocols ตัวอื่น ๆ ตรงที่ Connext ไม่ได้ใช้ Thrid parties ในการสื่อสารข้ามเชน ซึ่งนั้นหมายความว่าทาง Connext นั้นให้ความปลอดภัยแก่ผู้ใช้เทียบเท่ากับเชนต้นทาง โดยที่ผู้ใช้ไม่จำเป็นที่จะต้องเชื่อก็ได้ (Trust-minimized)

## Universal

Connext นั้นถูกออกแบบมาให้สามารถที่จะใช้งานได้กับทุกเชนทั้ง L1 และ L2 นักพัฒนาสามารถที่จะนำระบบของ Connext ไปเปิดใช้งานที่ไหนก็ได้ ทำให้ Connext สามารถขยายการเชื่อมต่อเข้ากับ cryptosystems ต่าง ๆ ได้อย่างรวดเร็ว

## Low Cost

ด้วยการออกแบบของ Connext ทำให้ Router บนเน็ตเวิร์คนั้นไม่จำเป็นที่จะต้องล็อค Liquidity หรือทำการสื่อสารกับเชน L1 ที่ช้าและมีราคาแพง ทำให้ Connext นั้นเป็น bridge สำหรับผู้ใช้ที่มีค่าใช้จ่ายที่ถูกที่สุด

ด้วยคุณสมบัติเหล่านี้ทำให้ Connext นั้มีความปลอดภัยสูง โดยผู้ใช้นั้นไม่จำเป็นต้องกังวลว่า Token ของผู้ใช้จะสูญหาย อีกทั้ง Connext ยังสามารถต่อยอดได้ง่ายด้วยระบบที่ออกแบบมาให้สามารถใช้งานได้ทุกเชน ใคร ๆ ก็สามารถมาเป็น router ได้ และที่สำคัญที่สุดก็คือ มีค่า fee ที่ถูกมาก ๆ ครับผม

title: Make a little progress every day
body:
Harvard University teachers often say to students in class: "success is not achieved overnight. If we can make a little progress every day - even 1% progress, what can stop us from finally becoming successful?" A little progress every day is not a big goal, nor is it difficult to achieve. Maybe yesterday's "I" also tried hard and achieved gratifying results, but today's I must surpass yesterday's "I" and make more progress and enrichment. Every day of life should be full of new things.
A little progress every day is enough. On the road of life, a little progress every day is a steady and continuous progress. "If you don't advance, you will fall back". As long as you are moving forward, no matter how small your progress is, it doesn't matter, but you must move forward a little bit than yesterday. Life must also continue to make small efforts every day in order to achieve something.
As long as we make a little progress every day, we will make a little progress 365 times a year. If we continue to do so, any gap in our lives may be hundreds of thousands of miles in a few years. A little bit every day is what we need to learn and what we need to do all our lives. Everyone is ordinary by nature. Don't imagine that you will suddenly be reborn and become a genius. You know, from ordinary to excellent to excellent, all you need to do is make a little progress every day.
In the 1985 American Professional Basketball League, the Los Angeles Lakers won the championship with their players' top skills. But in the final, he unexpectedly lost to Boston's Celtics, which made coach Patrick Reilly and all the players extremely frustrated.
Petrelli is a coach hired by the Lakers with an annual salary of $1.2 million. He will never let himself and his players stagnate in frustration. In order to restore the confidence of the players, he told everyone: "from today on, can we make a little progress in free throws, passing, steals, rebounds, long shots, and every aspect?" The player granted his request without hesitation. In the next year's training, the players always keep the spirit of "making a little progress" and constantly improve their skills.
Finally, in the 1986 American Professional Basketball League, the Lakers lived up to expectations and easily won the championship. When paitrelli won the championship, he said to the players: "our success is not accidental. Think about it, our 12 players have made 1% progress in five technical links in a year, so one player has made 5% progress, and the whole team has made 60% progress. The Lakers, who are at the peak of their skills, have increased 60% or even higher, so it is natural for us to achieve unexpected results."
A little progress every day sounds like there is no spirit, no tempting fruits, no sensational momentum. But after careful consideration, it says that people should be consistent and realistic. A little progress every day is the accumulation of success from childhood to great success; A little progress every day is the accumulation of self-confidence; Making a little progress every day is dismissing failure and frustration; A little progress every day is the best way to achieve a perfect life.
At Harvard, students have such a consensus: every day there is a bit of progress, which can not only give full play to their internal potential, but also accumulate capital for success. Indeed, success is a little progress every day - as long as I make a little progress today than yesterday, and I can make a little progress tomorrow than today, this process is success.

title: What is the most worthwhile thing to invest in your life

title: We can't be good people, but we can be better ourselves
body:
I used to think that actors are a magical species. They are naturally versatile. A person who can act seems to be able to sing, dance, folk art, sketches, musical instruments, crosstalk, and all 18 kinds of martial arts. He can stand still under any kind of spotlight.
It was not until I heard wangluodan talk about his experience of learning dance that I found that, except for those "other people's children" who were born to be angry with us, in fact, there are more "stupid people" who lack talent in all walks of life.
She said, "I stood in the middle of the dance room for the first time when I was 6 years old. My mother walked me through the door and gave me a hard look. The information was huge, including - my child, I was numbed by your wild behavior from childhood to childhood, but I will soon go to primary school. I hope you will make your last attempt to be a good girl who knows how to dance and stick. My mother loves you. If you don't dance well, you will eat vegetarian vegetables with your father tonight and watch the new dance Go to bed after listening to the broadcast. Do you understand? "
"I understand, so my steps are very heavy. The teacher taught us to turn horizontally, and all the children can rotate according to the track. Only I can turn like a headless fly. There were about a dozen students in the classroom. They laughed and bent over. This' laughter 'suddenly shattered my fantasy of talent. Therefore, from the age of 6, I knew that once I danced, I would hear laughter like applause. At that time, I gave up learning to dance."
I asked her, "when you were admitted to the Beijing Film Academy, didn't you want to show your art exam?"
She was a little proud. "I was admitted to the Beijing Film Academy at the age of 17. During the art examination, most of the female students did choose dance, ballet, ethnic, classical, even jazz and hip-hop. I was the only one who sang a rock song paranoia. At that time, I thought I was cool. Later, in the school's presentation performance, the student sister danced a duet" cradle on the stage, and my admiration ran through the whole adolescence. "
Her words reminded me of those students who achieved particularly good math scores in my high school days. They also admired them and became the most profound brand in my youth. Maybe everyone has an example at the bottom of their heart, who used to be the one we all want to be in our dreams.
I was curious, "you should be able to choose your favorite life and role now. It doesn't matter whether you can dance or not?"
She laughed, "I couldn't overcome my desire for dancing. Although I didn't have talent, I went to the dance rehearsal hall and tried again. Ha ha, I still couldn't do it. It was more difficult than I thought. I insisted on dancing for a month, but the movements were still not standard, the coordination was poor, and I often couldn't keep up with the rhythm. I confirmed that I would never have a chance to meet the standards of professional dancers. However, I laughed with my teammates and showed in the dance group. This was the greatest happiness."
"I really don't have talent, but I can be better. I am such a stupid and hard-working self. Even, everyone can't be an excellent person, but can be a better self."
The last sentence really poked me.
Our current popular culture is particularly intolerant of "stupid self" and "excellent others", especially those who live a less outstanding and happy life. Since ancient times, our aesthetic orientation has always been: "where there is a will, there is a way to accomplish things. When there is a will, there will be a way to sink the boat. Twelve hundred Qinchuan will eventually belong to Chu. The painstaking efforts of the people and the heaven will live up to their expectations. They will endure hardships and taste the gall. Three thousand Yuejia can swallow Wu."
In our philosophy of existence, there are too many strong people thinking. Even in the thinking mode of success, the meaning of the word "effort" has been misinterpreted - effort does not mean doing your best, but rather surpassing others, becoming the best strong person in a certain field, and comparing others.
Therefore, we believe in "not making excuses for failure, but finding methods for success", "there is nothing that cannot be done, only those who can not be done", and our "efforts" are too strong to win or lose.
However, not everyone's ideal is to become an outstanding person, and not everyone has the opportunity to become a strong person - genius and excellent guys are always the limited edition of life. Most of the time, we can only make "Einstein's third bench" - that although ugly, it is better than the first two. This wise man with the largest brain capacity also has no all-round talent. He still has a weakness, and his loveliness is not that he has worked hard to make up for his weaknesses and live a painless life, but that he still maintains his childishness and wants to make a little better looking bench, which is better than the first two.
This is the true meaning of efforts.
Even the most inconspicuous morning glory has its own unique beauty when it opens. It will never become a popular peony, but it still enjoys the process of blooming.
Not everyone's dream is to live in a big house, earn a lot of money and stand out. Many people are enjoying their own little happiness and calmly become happy ordinary people.
Those who try their best but don't shine, and those who work hard but don't succeed, still deserve applause.
A horse named "Chunli", which has never won, is a Japanese idol.
Chunli has lost every battle since she made her debut at Kochi Racecourse in November, 1998. For six years, Chunli has been running hard, but has never won the first. At the end of 2003, after Chunli set a record of 100 consecutive defeats, NHK TV broadcast an album of "losing superstar" on the evening news, and Chunli instantly became a well-known star.
In order to give Chunli a taste of winning the championship, on march22,2004, Wufeng, the most popular knight in Japan, served as Chunli's rider. On that day, the audience had to queue up for two hours to enter the arena, buy horse tickets and various souvenirs. Even the prime minister was paying attention to the results of the horse race.
There was no miracle. Chunli still ranked No. 10 among the 11 horses. This was her 106th failure, but it did not hurt the enthusiasm of the audience. Many people also proposed to help Chunli make a film and let her be the "heroine" again.
Why is a losing horse so obsessed?
Perhaps many people have seen the epitome of their own life from her - although they have failed all the time, they are still running. "Win" is a skill. Knowing that "win" can not be won, they are willing not to give up and strive for better results for themselves. It is open-minded, and it is the real meaning of the word "effort".
Just like each of us, we can't be excellent others, but we can be better ourselves.

title: Which abilities are important but most people don't?
body:
1. It's really an ability to express ideas accurately in words
   Indeed, most of us lack this skill, but it is extremely important.
   Expressing your ideas accurately in words can help you build relationships and impress others. Learn this skill well so that you can freely exchange ideas with others.
   The key to training your expression skills is to speak bravely.
   You can try to talk to strangers, chat up with train neighbors, and contact your first love that you haven't seen for a long time. A few words with people you need to summon up courage to talk to can force you to express your thoughts clearly.
2. Ability to get along with oneself
   Being alone is an ability.
   A person can also be very happy. If you master this skill, no one can take away your happiness. Be your own best friend, enjoy your company, and enjoy a person's happy time.
   If you have this skill, you will begin to appreciate the people and everything around you.
3. Breaking away from herding and not following others is also ability
   Someone once did an experiment in which a fence was placed in front of a group of sheep. After the leading sheep jumped over the fence, the sheep behind them would jump one by one.
   That seems reasonable, doesn't it.
   But when the fence was suddenly removed, the sheep behind continued to jump, as if the fence still existed.
   And humans are no smarter than sheep. We also have this "herd effect": we often learn things quickly, but sometimes we learn a lot of things wrong.
   Unfortunately, most of us are like sheep that continue to jump.
   Learning not to imitate others' sheep may be the most important lesson of our life.
4. Ability to recover quickly
   The ability of rapid recovery, specific to life, is the toughness of life.
   You should try to cultivate the ability to stand up again and again from failure, and never give up and set sail again even though you have failed in experiments again and again.
5. Ability to learn to let go
   Some things are really not tailor-made for you, and you may not get them no matter how hard you try. Sometimes you need to change your goals and plans.
   To learn the ability to let go, you can start with the following:
   Give up all material greed
   Throw away or donate all the clothes you don't wear
   Stop waiting for comments and likes from your circle of friends
   Stop hating that girl you've been dead set on
   ……
   Learning to let go is a sign of maturity. Although it is not easy, it is very important.
6. Ability to tell stories
   Many people let us remember for a long time because they know how to tell a good story.
   You will meet countless people in the decades of your life, and you will forget most of them, but you will remember those who can tell stories.
7. Ability to be "different"
   Another important skill for people is to know how to make a difference.
   You need to find a field where you can do better than everyone, and be a person who can create value for others. (even if your skills are small)
8. Self discipline
   Finally, what you need is the ability of self-discipline. Because it is the premise for you to realize almost any other dream.
   Self discipline means letting your thoughts determine your behavior, not your emotions.
   Even after the initial enthusiasm fades, continue to complete an idea or project, and say "no" in the face of temptation.
   If you are struggling with self-discipline, the good news is that it will certainly help you.

title: No one can succeed alone
body:
Now there is a popular loanword - "Maike", or "mankeep", which means "network management", transliterated as "Maike". Contacts refer to people who are good at using and managing contacts. According to a survey report of Stanford Research Center, 12.5% of people want to make money from knowledge and 87.5% from contacts. So some people say that contacts are wealth, and relationships are strength. This sentence is not without reason.
Three monks met in the broken temple. "Why is this temple deserted?" I wonder who raised the question.
"The monk must be ungodly, so the Bodhisattva doesn't work." Monk Jia said.
"It must be that the monks are not diligent, so the temple is not built." Said monk B.
"The monks must be disrespectful, so there are not many pilgrims." Monk C said.
The three argued and finally decided to stay and do their best. So monk a worshiped the Buddha and chanted scriptures, monk B tidied up the temple affairs, and monk C prayed in all directions. After such a period of time, the incense became more and more popular, and the old temple changed its appearance.
Therefore, monk Jia said, "all because of my devotion to Buddha, the Bodhisattva shows his spirit." Monk B said, "because I am diligent in management, the temple has comprehensive affairs." Monk Bing said, "because I persuade the world to run, so there are many pilgrims." The three people argued day and night, and the grand occasion in the temple gradually disappeared. On the day when they went north and south, they finally came to the same conclusion: the desolation of the temple was neither ungodly nor diligent, nor disrespectful, but the monks were unhappy!
Hamill company attaches great importance to interview results when recruiting new employees. In fact, the interview questions are not difficult, but few people can pass.
On july13,2003, the company conducted another unique interview. The examiner put a thick stack of documents and a folder on each person's desk and said to the interviewer, "please use the folder on the desk to put the folder in place within 5 minutes."
This is simply too easy. Everyone thinks so. As soon as the examiner's official voice fell, the interviewers could not wait to pick up the folder with their hands and try to put these folders together as soon as possible. What they didn't expect happened. The clip is big and hard. One hand can't open it. If you press it with two hands, you can't hold the document.
One minute has passed, two minutes have passed, and the happiness has long disappeared. The interviewers began to be restless, and some even gave up their efforts in advance. Five minutes later, the examiner announced the interview results, and only four interviewers passed the interview. It turned out that during the interview, the four of them were quickly divided into two groups. In each group, one person arranged the documents neatly on the table, and then held the two corners of one end of the document tightly with two hands, while the other person pressed the clip open with two hands, and then clamped the document. In less than a minute, four thick documents were neatly clamped.
This interview, in fact, examines the ability to unite and help each other.
Edison was a great inventor. He had more than 2000 inventions in his life, with an average of 13 days. So many inventions are incredible for one's limited energy and life. But Edison turned it into reality. The secret lies in the fact that Edison's laboratory has three right-hand assistants: the first is American Ott, who has unique expertise in machinery, surpassing Edison; The second was the Englishman bechler, who was silent and good at studying. He often asked some strange questions, which greatly inspired Edison; The third is the Swiss Cruz. He is good at drawing. No matter how rough Edison's manuscript is, he can make formal mechanical drawings. In addition, there were several hard-working people who worked as his assistants. It can be seen that three gangs for a hero, three stakes for a fence and green leaves for a red flower are universally applicable to all walks of life at all times and in all countries.
The same is true of man and nature. There is a plant called Sequoia in California, the United States. Its height is about 90 meters, equivalent to more than 30 floors. Generally speaking, the law of nature is "deep roots and luxuriant leaves". The taller the plant is, the deeper its roots should be. But scientists have found that the roots of Sequoia are just floating on the ground.
Theoretically, plants that do not have deep roots are very fragile. As long as a gust of wind can uproot them, how can Sequoia grow so tall and stand still? After further study, it is found that the growth of Sequoia must be a large Sequoia forest, and there is no independent Sequoia. This piece of Sequoia is closely connected with each other's roots, one by one, forming a large area. No matter how big a hurricane is in nature, it can not shake thousands of Sequoia forests whose roots are closely connected and cover an area of more than 1000 hectares.
The vigorous growth of Sequoia has given us great enlightenment: the success of our career comes from mutual help. Just like the roots of Sequoia are connected, with full and close cooperation, it creates a great cause that can not stand down.
Don't take yourself too seriously. One of the most important aspects to improve interpersonal relations is: be modest, keep a low profile, don't be arrogant and domineering, take others more seriously than yourself, take friends more seriously than yourself, and keep others in mind.

title: Multichain 心得
body:
**主持人：Alex，嘉宾：Mandy_Z**

【简介】

团队的愿景是将Multichain打造web3.0的终极路由器

Multichain是致力于支持跨链互动的基础设施。目前，我们已部署2200+跨链桥，这样各种资产与NFT可以在我们所支持的50多条主流链之间实现自由跨链。

发布了Co-mint跨链解决方案，Co-mint支持不同跨链桥铸造同一种资产，解决了流动性割裂问题的同时也提高了用户体验度

【特色】

和其它第三方跨链桥相比Multichain的特色

1. 非托管协议，由多方计算网络（MPC）提供安全支持
2. 为用户提供零滑点的跨链服务
3. Multichain路由能够使用户资产在任意链之间跨链，极大降低了跨链成本
4. 致力于推动多链生态的发展，深信多链是未来的发展趋势，为此我们建立了庞大的生态，以满足用户多种多样的跨链需求，目前我们已集成了50+条公链，提供了2200+多种跨链解决方案
5. 一直在不断升级改善跨链产品，提升安全等级，研发跨链创新方案，产品与技术是我们的优势。

【800多亿的总交易量，如何发展到该水平】

1. 跨链手续费最低，仅占总交易量的0.03%，这对于用户来说十分划算，而且针对稳定币的跨链交易，我们不收取任何手续费
2. 支持大额跨链交易，例如针对USDC的大额跨链，最大金额可以达到百万USDC，对于有大额跨链交易需求的用户来说，Multichain一步到位，在效率与成本上都具有优势
3. 建立之初就确保协议开源，经过长期代码审查，我们的安全性能经受住种种考验，让用户放心。
4. 一直在努力拓展生态，用户可以在我们的多链生态中自由快速地转移资产

【veMULTI ？】

veMULTI是针对multiDAO的管理方案。MULTI质押者可以获得veMULTI NFT

该NFT是MULTI质押者认领跨链手续费分红的凭证，与此同时，veMULTI NFT持有者还会获得针对DAO内部治理提议的投票权，参与社区治理

veMULTI NFT的能量由MULTI质押数量与锁定时长决定。MULTI质押者所得的跨链手续费收益每周将以USDC分发，因此MULTI不会有溢出，也就不会有稀释

veMULTI下一步计划？

2022年第二季度我们会向veMULTI持有者发放Multichain第一季度跨链手续费的分红

在了解社区成员的意愿后，我们也将在其它主流公链上部署veMULTI

关于Multichain社区治理的veMULTI投票系统也将在第二或第三季度上线，届时veMULTI 持有者将进一步参与社区的管理与运营

【不同之处】

veMULTI的设计参考了veCRV 和Solidly

1. 相较于前两者，veMULTI NFT是可以在NFT市场上自由交易。veMULTI NFT可以转换成其它ERC-20代币，这也为veMULTI持有者提供了灵活的退出渠道
2. 相比之下，MULTI质押者可以获得更高的年化收益，自上线以来，年化率保持在120%-160%
3. veMULTI NFT持有者所得收益是以USDC发放，而不是其他代币，这样持有者认领收益的过程更加简便低成本
4. veMULTI的治理权分配更加去中心化，我们重视每一个个体在社区治理中的权重

【安全吗？】

第一：我们在今年年初确实遇到了hack事件，但此次攻击是小概率，与我们的技术路线无关。为加强安全，我们已上线fastMPC 网络，进一步提高我们去中心化程度，同时我们与审计公司Immunefi 合作提出了赏金计划，另外我们也设立了安全基金。除了进行多方审计之外，我们自身也采取了一系列风险控制措施包括链上安全预警+定期资金检测等

title: Youth
body:
## Youth

> Update: 2022.06.07

Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind; it is not a matter of rosy cheeks, red lips and supple knees; it is a matter of the will, a quality of the imagination, a vigor of the emotions; it is the freshness of the deep springs of life.

Youth means a temperamental predominance of courage over timidity, of the appetite for adventure over the love of ease. This often exists in a man of 60 more than a boy of 20. Nobody grows old merely by a number of years. We grow old by deserting our ideals.

Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul. Worry, fear, self-distrust bows the heart and turns the spirit back to dust.

Whether 60 or 16, there is in every human being’s heart the lure of wonder, the unfailing childlike appetite of what’s next and the joy of the game of living. In the center of your heart and my heart there is a wireless station: so long as it receives messages of beauty, hope, cheer, courage and power from men and from the Infinite, so long are you young.

When the aerials are down, and your spirit is covered with snows of cynicism and the ice of pessimism, then you are grown old, even at 20, but as long as your aerials are up, to catch waves of optimism, there is hope you may die young at 80.

title: Tell you why you can't make money
body:
I never hate money. I believe you don't either. Then we will have a common language. There are three things I like to do every day:
It doesn't matter how much you read or how little you read. The key is to turn two pages when you have nothing to do, which means you haven't become a worldly person.
Exercise, I think the best rest is exercise, which can stimulate people's passion. Sweating in front of the mirror, I immediately have confidence in life.
Make money, give full play to your talent, do what you like to do, and make money by the way. Buy a bag when your wife is happy. Er - making money is divided into making money with ability, making money with relationships, making money with money, making money with others, making money with resources, and making money with looks... I really want to do this later.
Well, get down to business.
I think it is possible for a person to reach a level in his life. This level is to make money by doing everything and make money by not doing anything. As long as I want to make money, I can make money at any time. For example, I can make money by giving lectures, publishing books, writing columns, planning creativity, making money by doing talk shows, making money by doing stocks and fund management, and making money by flattering my wife. Er... In short, I can make money by doing many things. Although I won't be rich, I don't seem to lack money.
This is not true. The story club sent me a private letter on the microblog, saying: Sir, we picked up a microblog from you. Can you express the 50 yuan contribution fee to you. Er, how generous... I often receive such huge sums of money. Of course, I usually refuse them. Duang - the reply is: donate it for me - do you think brother is a good man?
But I also have many friends who have been poor all their lives and can not reach this stage. They have been forced to work hard and exhaust their lives in front of the computer. In the end, they fell down with cervical spondylosis and dare not leave their jobs. They also dare not change their jobs, because they have to change their mortgage, pay their children's tuition, pay their utilities, and pay their credit cards... They can only sit on the roof of the building one evening at sunset, smoke a cigarette, and sigh, This is the fucking life. Then I came back to wash and sleep. The next day, I continued to reincarnate.
I think about it. The reasons why a person does not realize financial freedom in the end are as follows:

1. Fail to develop their own core and unique abilities before the age of 35
   This ability must not be easily replaced by others. Only in this way can you be valuable. Isn't there a saying:
   Don't deliberately integrate into any circle. When your energy reaches a certain level, the corresponding circle will automatically absorb you.
   Some people will feel that they know a lot of people, especially those who are awesome. They feel that their whole life is floating. They feel that they have a part of you in their life. They even feel that everyone is on an equal footing. In fact, this kind of thing, if you are not a bully yourself, no matter how you flatter and approach those bullys, it is just a foil. You are a real bull. If you are strong, you are really strong.
   Therefore, a long-term relationship must be that you have the ability in a certain aspect, that is, you have value. No matter how you change jobs before the age of 35, you must remember to cultivate your core competitiveness in a certain aspect.
2. No good popularity
   It's hard for me to succeed without help these days. For example, you can go to the stock market. Speaking of this sad thing, I have also started to speculate in the stock market recently. Countless friends have come to me to give me news. In China, I think that it depends on news, luck and technology.
   Whether the news is accurate or not, people really want to make money. Good contacts are the kind of people who are happy when they see you.
   As for some people, they just think about themselves and think that others should help themselves and seek benefits for themselves. Are you handsome or are your ancestral graves smoking? Why should people help you, especially when it comes to making money? If it weren't for your close friends, who would make you rich. So if you have nothing to do, should you like it more in your circle of friends?
   A friend of mine takes out one hour each morning and afternoon to comment on the circle of friends, and likes those who don't have comments. He said that only in this way will his friends remember him. Even those who are not familiar with him will remember him because he often appears. So his girlfriend came here with praise, his work came here with praise, and he borrowed the money he bought the house with praise. He said that the progress of human history cannot be separated from praise.
   Therefore, we should accumulate more friends at ordinary times. Don't wait to use others before thinking of being good to others. Don't you know that interpersonal relationship is like a potted flower. If you don't cultivate it carefully, it will wither. How to water and fertilize? Make a phone call to ask for help, invite guests to dinner and don't forget to snack. Give him the good-looking microblog Aite... Be kind to others, and they will always miss you.
   You don't plant flowers to pick them, but when they bloom, you can naturally smell the fragrance.
3. Don't think independently, don't delve into the logic behind it
   Just follow the trend. News is very important, luck is very important, and finally there is a technology, isn't there?
   The master leads you in. Your integrity depends on yourself. I always think I'm not a smart person, but I just like to think about it. It's a very smooth word. For example, I have been speculating in stocks recently. I use a notebook every day to write down today's operation reflection, such as why the stock was bought less, why the stock was sold early, why the management wanted to reduce its holdings, what the various fluctuations of the K-line chart imply... I take a notebook and write it down. If one day I succeed and the reporter interviews me, I can also turn over the notebook and tell him whether my road to success is not?
   In this era, there are many smart people, but few people are willing to think hard.
   Therefore, if you want to enter any discipline and master any kind of knowledge, you must work hard. If you want to master it, you must first love it.
   With these three guarantees, I think you can also achieve financial freedom. Forget it. My wife said that if I dragged the floor, I would be given 100 yuan to make money. It's so free.

title: Do you think you work hard enough?
body:
Even if life is a long-distance race, it is only a long-distance race without rivals. If there are rivals, it is only you. In this process, you only need to pay attention to your progress. How much you pay, how much you get. Try your best to do well in your hands. When you are tired and tired and want to be lazy, warn yourself: you think you are working hard, but you don't even see the edge of your efforts.

1. Even if life is a long-distance race, you only need to pay attention to your progress
   In the past, people used to say that life is a long-distance race, not winning or losing at any moment. A long time ago, I thought this view was quite objective. Yes, there are so many opponents. It is not necessarily who is ahead of you at any time. The one who wins at the end is the one who wins.
   Now I think this sentence also has a big problem.
   Although the process of life is full of competition, its purpose is definitely not competition. We study hard, work hard, and constantly enrich and improve ourselves. Our ultimate goal should not be to surpass others, but to meet our own requirements for self realization. If you like to do this job and are willing to do it, you should spend more time and energy. How much you spend is worth it, and how much you gain in the end. You have a balance in your heart; You don't like it so much. Consider its importance, invest the corresponding energy and time, and finally achieve many results, which is also due to cause and effect. There is no need to compare it with others.
   People have their own advantages and disadvantages. You don't have to feel complacent because you are half better than others in that matter, and you don't have to be ashamed because you are half worse than others in something. Just take care of yourself. People's energy is so limited and their talents are so different that it is difficult to give up the details and grasp the key points; If you can get rid of the competitive mentality, it is valuable to calmly use your talent and corresponding diligence to deal with it.
   Most of the time, people complain because they don't understand what they want or don't want. Even if life is a long-distance race, it is only a long-distance race without rivals. If there are rivals, it is only you. In this process, you only need to pay attention to your progress.
   2、no pay, no gain
   In my not too long life experience at present, many ordinary people in Contemporary Chinese society pursue "shortcuts", which is really difficult for me to agree with.
   From those who evade tickets and jump in the queue, to those who are unwilling to get up early to register and find it difficult to get a hospital number, from those who are always cramming for the exam, to those who are looking forward to picking up leaks in the antique market, all these are simply small and broad, or even unearned.
   In any case I can imagine, the hard work cost we pay is closely related to the substantial benefits we get (note that I am talking about substantial benefits, not counting the kind of threatening our tutors to commit suicide and finally get a degree). There may be differences in the proportion of the two, but this is more because we are at different levels of the interest chain. When we are still at a very low level, we begin to fantasize about paying very little cost to obtain great benefits. This is really a very absurd thing.
   At the age of twelve, I hoped to find a job that would enable me to earn enough money to spend before I was thirty, then retire at thirty, and spend money every day after that. After a few years of high school, I realized how stupid this wish is. Up to now, I think it's a very happy thing to find a job I like and devote all my efforts to it until one of me and the other no longer need the other. The necessary money and reputation in exchange are just accessories. In most cases, these things can't be balanced with your interests and time. On the other hand, a child wants to find a job that is easy, profitable, respected and likes, and then relax for a lifetime. This is also very bullshit.
   It's very simple. How much you pay, how much you get. The irrefutable truth, at least in my case.
2. Group and self identification
   I would also like to say that my middle school is a middle school in Shaanxi Province. Every year, the number of students attending Tsinghua and Peking University is the largest, and a champion pops up from time to time. When I was in middle school, I often felt inflated because of this kind of data. I felt that I was a member of this school, so I was very good. Looking at other school students, I felt that I was superior.
   When I went to college, I immediately realized that my middle school state was like a clown.
   I must admit that there are advantages and disadvantages between a group and a group, but it is the individual that determines the advantages and disadvantages of a group. The reason why a university is outstanding is that there are masters or once were masters. If a famous university is no longer a master or a leader for one generation or even several generations, the so-called famous brand has become stronger than the outside and stronger than the inside. It is even used by future generations as a capital to show off and flaunt.
   We are always used to marking ourselves with the relatively excellent group we belong to, as if it is some kind of identity. From middle school to university to work, it seems that with the identity of this group, we become very safe and have quality assurance. It seems that as long as this group goes out, I must be highly qualified and proficient in business. In fact, cause and effect are reversed. You were able to join this group at first because you worked hard and improved. You can only jump into a relatively excellent group at the time of stage change. If you indulge after coming in, you will start to be decadent. Even if you are labeled as a defective product.
   I respect the people who have always worked hard. I think these people don't care what labels they are labeled, but only their own efforts. As long as we don't stop, we will continue to grow and strengthen ourselves. If one day, the current group can no longer accommodate themselves and can no longer provide a broad enough stage for themselves, it doesn't matter. They will enter a new and better group.
   These people do not value the identification of the group, but only need to identify with their own efforts.
3. No one is a loser, just be an elite
   At the very beginning, like many eight-year students of Peking Union Medical College, I didn't like the idea that we should be trained into elites in the school training plan. I felt that it was too inconsistent with the actual teaching situation. Moreover, in a place that advocates the golden mean, China, it was easy to cry out that elites would be hated and attacked by others, and the gun would shoot the first bird. For a long time, I thought so. But until the recent emergence of loser culture, more and more people began to argue that they are losers. I think it is necessary to mention the word "elite".
   A person, no matter how smart he is, as long as he is down-to-earth and hard enough to do his own work to the extreme, in my opinion, he is an elite. The Ramen master and the old man making steamed buns in China on the tip of the tongue are elites who love their work and do their best seriously. In this sense, no one should be a loser. Maybe you will say that this is a joke, and you still have to work hard. I hope so, too. What I am afraid of is that people influence each other. You say you are a loser, he says you are incompetent, and I say you are two. In the end, it is all about finding reasons for laziness and foolishness. It seems that it is reasonable to be depressed because of some inherent shortcomings.
   This is really bullshit. Dare to shout, is it difficult for me to do the best I can? Do you think it's fake?
   I won't. I just want to do my best to do what I do. If this is the performance of the elite, I will be the elite!
   Finally, I ended with a sentence that I have loved for a long time but do not know where it came from. Every time I feel tired and tired and want to be lazy, when I see this sentence, it will last another year and a half: once I thought I was working hard, but in fact I didn't even see the edge of my efforts.

title: 22.06.06Walken日记0（STEPN总结）
body:
这篇文章有点碎碎念…分三段：初心、总结、Lesson Learned。不讨论项目方的骚操作，毕竟还没盖棺定论，只反思自己的操作是否还有改进的地方。

## 初心

明天Walken就要开公测了，这篇第0篇日记其实是纪念一下玩儿STEPN的韭菜时刻。我想进一步体验walken的原因是：他的系统看起来结合了axie和stepn，更复杂，而且能够激励用户螺旋升级。好看也是很重要的因素，再加上是头矿，就跟着亏钱的家人们一起冲好了。在此写个日记记录一下。

顺便，督促自己提高在web3世界的信息获取效率。大菠萝即使最后被DC community编排成为出气筒，我始终认为是一个非常理性、合理分析的人。因此我也是用这个模仿的方式致敬一下吧。

我是做classic VC的，甚至不是web2.0投资人，投先进制造。想接触web3是因为不愿意搓个这个大机会，前段时间而且有点想润新加坡。最开始玩STEPN是因为有朋友/面试的老板说：你对tokenomics感兴趣，梦幻玩得也挺好，建议你也去玩玩gamefi，充点钱进去赢过钱亏过钱才会更有感觉，于是就入坑了。

确实，从结果来看花了一些能接受的钱（损失），快速上手接触了很多乱七八糟的工具，也沉浸在各种FOMO/FUD情绪中，眼看着今年web3最火的项目楼起楼塌，也是一种体验。

## 总结

看了一下欧易的出入金记录（thanks to its easy kyc!!）,总共买了接近15000个U，经过一番合约体验操作之后兑换成了204个SOL，再加上给代跑的1000U，以上是全部成本。一直没有挖提卖过，代跑赚来的钱都拿来养大号了。

截至前天（6月4日）破防决定清掉代跑盘，清出来了50个sol+接近1000个U（四舍五入20个sol吧！），剩下两个号，残值价值大概20个单灰（有几对跑步用的trainer和宝石），按当天5.5sol算的话整个盘剩下180sol\~7200U。按现在剩的9灰号每天净40gst-大半个sol左右算，SOL本位的话715之前勉强回本有望= = 

不过也是因为没全清，这20个单灰还是在受着鞋价波动的影响（现在FP\~4），我已经拿来当健身卡了，重在享受游戏吧。

 ~~所以我有很长一段时间一直说sol的背叛比STEPN伤我更深（也是因为我没进bsc所以没脚踝斩）~~

![那天真的破防很严重，也包括前一天听完Yawn的咖啡AMA我感受到的是扑面而来的背叛：你们这帮热衷于Ponzi的早期玩家不再是我们的目标用户，我们没有义务保护你的资产价格。               ——但是我这种始终复投一毛钱没挖提卖过的Gamer才是受伤最深的啊](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Xtt1swymMnrI2wZUn_82D.png?height=333&width=1125)

## Lesson Learned（按重要性排列！）

* 最重要的一点：利益没有达成一致。正如我破防的那天所感受的：我没有感受到Yawn对保护我们的资产有一丝incentive，甚至恶意揣测他是故意压价洗盘好降低进入门槛引入更多的新用户。如果最后游戏活下来、日活重生，我不得不佩服这是一步好棋，STEPN确实不需要我们这些逐利用户了；如果最终半死不活，那只能说是主创团队对于核心玩家过于傲慢了。

  另外关于GMT和版税收入：最开始我看白皮书的时候有留意过GMT的解锁机制，也留意到了交易费用归属“团队和NFT创作者版税”这个sneaky的表述方式，我只能说在这个点上，项目方做了一个格局很小的trick：用classic VC的话来说，GMT是一个只有治理权（其实也没有）而没有分红权的空气币。其实没有价值，只有游戏应用的供需，本质上是非常反WEB3 gamefi精神的一种分配方式，其主要利润归属还是游戏公司（而非持币者）。另外大头是版税\~给创作者≈给团队这个事情，用classic coporate management的话来说属于非常严重的关联交易，把属于公司（游戏）的利润套空。

  螺旋周期时，英文区大管理gil也提到在sGST到8刀的时候，“团队尝试抛出额外的gst来平抑物价，但是无效”，因此不在gst低价时回购。这也是非常差的治理：在gst价格高的时候团队抛出（不管是加池还是mint直接参与市场）额外的gst看起来更像是割韭菜套钱而不是尝试平抑物价。

  **这个治理结构本身就是非常非常非常不合理、不公平的，和web2“我是你爹无限通胀”游戏没有本质区别。更不用说各类中心化、忽视社区声音的调控了。**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AL4igVj9_V-E5rj8KoEDR.png?height=250&width=1222)

* 没有做套保：很多gamefi老鸟都闷声做套保了，说这个游戏最大的好处就是sol和gst的价格都能套。最终做套保的都没有亏本，享受到了二十多天回本的稳稳红利，唯一套不住的是生产工具鞋子的价格而已。

  因为没人指点（而且运气不好，充值完一周内就遇上Terra事件，没机会给我学习），初期根本没有手段了解套保的重要性，眼看着sol价格跟瀑布一样滑下来。

  中后期则是因为懒惰、忽视了小交易所，一直没有下载gate、抹茶，导致在了解到这个工具之后仍然没有对自己的资产做保护。
* 市场具有无效性，或者说是完全可以有机会做到领先时间的：作为网上冲浪高手，在项目方发起AMA以及DC公告的时候，我往往能比市场情绪更早地感受到信息，并且实现了两次成功的GMT（在欧易有货，我惰性了…）逃顶（715清退、yawn AMA）。非常后悔没有反手做空的意识，死多头只配粉身碎骨。
* 熊市，在波动率那么大的币圈，即使是头部项目安全性也很差。原因也包括ponzi生态的不稳定，稍稍收一下水，在还没找到出路的时候都会有剧烈的影响。更不用说项目方做了错误的BSC链尝试（且又当又立不做调控），最终造成了崩盘。

最后的最后，感谢读者看到那么后。

作为web3项目的参与实践——有兴趣打赏的话，试一下libert.sol？

title: Not that you didn't have a chance, but that you didn't make a choice
body:
We always think we have no choice. But not making any choice is just standing still. It is also a choice, and you can choose not to do this to yourself.
Most people always think that not making choices means not making any choices, but in fact, "not making choices" is also a kind of choices, but you just choose not to act.
"Opportunities are always available, but without strength, opportunities are not yours."
No one has the responsibility to give you opportunities unless you strive for them. In other words, opportunities are won, not waiting.
Don't complain about why no one gives you a chance. Instead, ask yourself whether you have enough ability. When the opportunity comes, whether you have enough ability to firmly grasp it.
People will always encounter several great opportunities in their life. Don't worry about why the opportunity hasn't come yet. On the contrary, you should worry about whether you have the ability to firmly grasp it when the opportunity comes.
When an opportunity comes, usually everyone will have several reactions.
1、 Strive for
2、 Choose not to fight
3、 Let it be
4、 Invisible opportunity
Usually, when an opportunity comes, it is yours only when you strive for it. Let it be or not, the opportunity usually slips away. As long as you look around carefully, you can actually find that there are opportunities everywhere, but some people can't see it, some people ignore it, and successful people will actively strive for it.
Most people are not actively looking for opportunities, but waiting for an opportunity.
Even some people choose to do things that go against their true thoughts because they are afraid to live up to the expectations of others. When we choose to make a choice that meets the expectations of others, it is easy to find out later that this is not what we want.
In fact, it's not that we don't have a chance, but that we don't make a choice. As long as we think carefully, we will find that successful people know how to observe the changes around us, and then create opportunities for themselves according to the current situation. For example, in the current network revolution, some people choose to start a business at this time, and then succeed. Some people don't see the opportunity, or are unwilling to change and afraid to bear the consequences of failure, So it's not that I don't have a chance, but that I'm not willing to make a choice.
What is more important than opportunity is what actions are you willing to take and what choices are you willing to make?
Do you choose to study hard, even if you have to sacrifice an hour of reading every day?
Can you choose to get up an hour earlier than others just to do a better job every day?
Can you choose to run more customers in order to increase the company's performance?
It is our daily choices that make everyone different in life.
"A good decision does not depend on the choices you make at the moment, but on the decisions you make. Therefore, people who are not willing to be responsible can never make a good decision."
Everyone should prepare himself every day, because what he does every day is preparing for the future. When a person is fully prepared, the opportunity comes. If he is not prepared, no matter what opportunity he has, it is not his.
No matter what you want to do, the most difficult thing is to take the first step. When you have the courage to take the first step, you will feel that there is nothing. Life is accumulated by a series of choices and decisions. Every seemingly insignificant action determines your future life.
There is no need to worry about life. No one gives you opportunities, because opportunities depend on your own creation. More importantly, whether you are willing to make choices or not. Life itself is constantly making choices. Even if you are not willing to make choices, it is also a choice.

title: Arbitrum 与 LayerZero NFT互动教程
body:
近来 Layer2 赛道 (比如 **Arbitrum** ) 和 Layer0 赛道（比如 **LayerZero_Lab**）成为了人们竞相追逐的热点。在 Arbitrum 上面交互的方式有许多，比如使用defi，或者mint NFT 等。而 LayerZero_Lab 的交互就有点让新手摸不着头脑，因为这是一个底层协议。那么使用支持这个协议的项目来完成一次跨链，似乎是个不错的操作。

这是近期 ETH sh 黑客松 上面的一个项目（[项目链接](https://0dayproject.xyz/)），建立在了 **Arbitrum** 上，并且使用了 **LayerZero_Lab** 的omni 跨链协议，在黑客松期间有发过一些空投。有参与过他们[推特](https://twitter.com/0DayProject/)活动的，可以试试在不通过其他跨链桥的前提下，直接操作这个 NFT 从 **Arbitrum** 跨到 **Polygon**，感觉还算挺神奇的。本文翻译自：

**以下是译文，水平不佳，还望见谅\~**

如今，大多数所谓的 Omni NFT 都是简单的模仿：无论是mint操作还是跨链操作。但最近在 ETH sh 黑客松中，有一个基于omni的NFT项目脱颖而出。它摒弃了那种直接在区块浏览器上用合约mint的笨拙方式，也不需要预先支付大量的gas来跨链。恰恰相反，它通过一个有趣的像素游戏风格的前端页面实现了Mint ，这个页面使用精准的计算来完成跨链工作，至少你不需要像其他仿盘项目一样预先支付大量的 gas。

这是他们[项目文档](https://docs.0dayproject.xyz/travelers-guide/choose-your-nft)中的跨链教程：

假设你现在 Arbitrum 上已经拥有了 **ZeroDay: Fightkack NFT** （注：这个是他们项目的名字…），无论它们是空投或 mint 的，都可以。

登录项目 Dapp : \*\*[https://0dayproject.xyz ](https://0dayproject.xyz/)\*\*并连接 **Metamask**，点击界面的 **Arbitrum** 按钮 \*\*，\*\*将网络设置为 Arbitrum （或者您可以通过操作 Metamask 手动切换网络）：

![](https://mirror.xyz/\_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fg2Qt4XotLJqtMXtvlhBkR.png\&w=1920\&q=90)

稍等片刻，您将看到您持有的 NFT：

![](https://mirror.xyz/\_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fep0StcWzcB36dMV3QLSIY.png\&w=1920\&q=90)

以下图为例，我们选择\*\*#1002**开始跨链之旅。#1002的职业是一个骑士！你会在这个 NFT 下面看到一个下拉列表，我们选择 Polygon** 网络或任何你想去的链（当然，在第 1 阶段你只能在 Arbitrum 和 Polygon 之间选择，但很快就会为其他链开启传送门），然后点击开始\*\*按钮：

![](https://mirror.xyz/\_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2Fml9cOKLG-waXHBzIIsg3r.png\&w=1920\&q=90)

然后 Dapp 会计算跨链所需的费用，并弹出对话框显示。如下图所示，这个跨链所需的手续费用只需要0.00001027 ETH，比Arbitrum的GAS费用还要低！你要知道 L2 的GAS本来就已经很低了。如果您准备好跨链了，就单击**Traverse**按钮​​：

![](https://mirror.xyz/\_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FlxcwvP4hAPNmW_qbt3t3P.png\&w=1920\&q=90)

然后就是在小狐狸窗口进行操作，你将在 Matamask 上看到交易详情：Traverse Fee 0.00001027 eth 和 Gas Fee 0.000383 eth。然后点击**确认**按钮：

![](https://mirror.xyz/\_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.mirror-media.xyz%2Fpublication-images%2FJ0U79D05ry5BCVV9n34aG.png\&w=1920\&q=90)

这里要注意，与 Gas费 一样，跨链费也是一直在变化着的。所以在Traverse Fee 计算完毕的时候，请尽快点击 **Traverse** 按钮，否则**可能会**因为**跨链手续费不足**导致交易失败。如果计算完 Traverse Fee 后长时间没有确认，请关闭对话框并点击 **GO** 按钮重新计算。

title: A man with his hands in his pockets will never climb the ladder of success
body:
1、 I don't want to
The reason why you don't want to do it is that you haven't reached the end of the mountain for the time being, and you don't have to do it. You still have a choice to make, there is room for maneuver, and you can make choices according to your own wishes. The reason why you don't want to do it is because you are afraid of the whole seemingly difficult process and have no confidence in the possible results.
But not every ideal result can have an attractive opportunity at the beginning. You can see the future at a glance, and then put all your eggs in one basket. The same is true of opportunities. When they first appear around you, they are usually far from as beautiful as you think. They are like a piece of rough jade. Only when they are carefully carved can they show their luster.
In discovering beautiful things, many people only look at the surface and use perceptual thinking to select. We are always used to having a great purpose before we pay and invest. We do not do anything that is not good or that has little return, but we often lose the insight to see the essence through the phenomenon.
Laziness is the poison of life and the gene of failure. No one wants to bite the hard bone, but life is not picky for you, and failure and suffering will not wait for you to knock when you are ready. You don't want to do it. There are many people who want to do it. When you want to do it, they have already done it. You don't need to do it. There are many things that you don't want to do. Everyone has their own negative feelings of fear of difficulties, but don't want to do it doesn't mean you don't have to do it forever.
2、 I had no idea
Unexpectedly, it is probably your excuse for your failure and your excuse for all imperfections. There are still a few things in Baimi. There are always many things you can't imagine, but nothing will happen or not happen because you can't imagine.
For the same event, you didn't expect it to succeed, so you can't do your best; You didn't expect it to fail, so you are more likely to take chances. You take "unexpected" as the reason for success, and attribute all the occasional and inevitable connections to luck.
Unexpectedly, it is impossible to do it, let alone do it well. No one can predict the future, and no one can control the present. There are many unexpected things. You can't imagine the unexpected benefits brought by the completion of the set goals, let alone the unpredictable risks associated with each link. You can't think of it, but someone always wants it and does it well. Things are in constant motion and change, and any opportunity is left to the resourceful and prepared mind. When you really think of it one day, the opportunity may no longer favor you.
When looking at problems, some people like to observe the surface of things and make analysis and judgment based on experience; Some people pry into the essence and go deep into its marrow. Even though things are ever-changing, only through careful consideration and implementation of future decisions can we have more possibilities to achieve.
3、 I tried my best
The reason why you feel like doing your best is that you feel sorry for yourself and moved by yourself in the face of the established results; It is your psychological state of self satisfaction by comparing your current results with your previous achievements. But perhaps the source of this sense of satisfaction is that if you take a few more steps than before, increase a few percentage points, lift more weight and make more efforts, you will already be overwhelmed and can't bear to add weight.
The greatest potential of a person is to discover another new self in constant transcendence. If you don't dare to beat yourself and don't break the limit, you will never know how much energy you have. If you are blindly satisfied with the status quo, you will easily be defeated by reality.
What's more, in this predatory society, it doesn't mean that if you try your best, you can have plenty of food and clothing and rest easy; It doesn't mean that if you try your best, you can avoid responsibility and get everyone's understanding. People who are better than you are trying their best to catch up, and people who are better than you are also trying to persist. You will not be eliminated unless you keep forging ahead and surpassing. Otherwise, we will be beaten if we lag behind. This is an indisputable truth.
Trying hard is not equal to doing your best. Maybe you still have unknown potential waiting to burst out. You need to find a flowing outlet for it. Success always belongs to people who strive for self-improvement. If you do more, your life may be different.
4、 It's impossible
The reason why you feel impossible is that you lack self-confidence, blindly defend yourself, and underestimate your energy and value. This is your arbitrary positioning. Before you put it into practice, you will be crushed by your own will.
Such people have pure motivation when they are in trouble. They only fight with preparation and confidence. They always refuse to take risks. They never dare to try easily and dare not challenge themselves. Refusal means that you will lose more opportunities. If you dare not turn the "impossible" into "possible", restrictions are everywhere. Therefore, your life can only be limited to the height of self judgment, and you will never be able to jump.
If you want to reach a higher position, you should have greater ambition and perseverance. There is no physical difference between people. They are all over a hundred kilograms of meat. They are biologically the same. The difference is in the soul. How big your spiritual world is, how broad your vision is, and how broad your life is. The boundary of a person's career lies in his heart. If you want to ensure the continuous growth of the boundary of your career, you must expand the boundary of your soul.
The stage is as big as the heart. There are not so many impossibilities in life. Self confidence creates miracles. If you want to succeed, you must have an undefended mind and bravely make every "impossible" possible. Then the perfect life "possible" belongs to you.
5、 No one helped me
The reason why you feel isolated is mostly the result of your own life management. Some people find their way from one side to the other, and they are all powerful. Some people walk with difficulty and run into a wall everywhere. This is the projection of your self-worth on the social stage, reflected in your personality charm.
It is a mutual principle and an emotional bond between people to give back the love of others. No one was born with you as the center, only to help you; And no one will take the trouble to be your Savior, except your parents.
So if someone is willing to help you, it is a blessing of care; Even if there is no one to help, it is your duty. You don't have to complain about it. This is not the root cause of failure. There are many factors for success. It is not that people lose faith and give up their pursuit without help. If no one helps you, you can also learn to enrich yourself, enrich your heart, improve your ability and realize the odds of winning.
There are many roads in life, and many roads are only suitable for you. Everything can only be accomplished by cooperating with others. Such people are not mature. Only by pursuing not to be attached to anyone can you get freedom in the true sense.
At any time when there is no way to go, you can still trust your strength without help. Just like wearing a life buoy, you will never learn to swim; Only by breaking free of the reins can a horse gallop thousands of miles.
6、 It's none of my business
In the face of punishment for mistakes and responsibility, in order to avoid possible risks and avoid unnecessary relationships, we often become cowardly and indifferent. We always like to use the sentence "it's none of my business" to try to get rid of the relationship and let others become scapegoats. But at the time of harvest, reward and reward based on merit, you can always sharpen your head. Even for small profits, you should be righteous and stand up as a "hero".
In the real society we live in, there is no clear boundary. As an independent individual in a social group, your existence is always inextricably linked with your surrounding environment. You should believe that all the people you meet are due arrangements, and your destiny is also in them. There will always be a change and transcendence, starting from the current situation. Therefore, you can not be short-sighted, easily refuse anyone's request, and cut off your own way back.
Every inch has its advantages. Everyone should depend on the outside world to survive. Helping others is a virtue of kindness, and your path will be widened in good deeds. In the face of the law of constant movement and development, you have to learn to bow your head, but those selfish and narrow-minded in the past will only make you have no way to go.
Therefore, those who can achieve great things must be brave and responsible; A man with his hands in his pockets will never climb the ladder of success.

title: Your warmth is invincible, your lowliness is admired by thousands of people
body:
Mandela's death attracted worldwide attention. More than 90 national leaders went to South Africa to attend the funeral. He won the respect of the world. Mandela spans the post colonial era, the apartheid era in South Africa, the Cold War era and the era of globalization. Different times have given him different identities. From the world's most famous prisoner to South Africa's first black president, from a revolutionary to a preacher of reconciliation and tolerance, the political and cultural labels superimposed on him are not only unique to him, but also reflect the common memory of his resistance and promotion of reconciliation at the same time, That is, the "glorious years" that the Chinese are familiar with.
In the process of historical evolution, Mandela also experienced spiritual cleansing again and again. Finally, under the guidance of the dream of building a "Rainbow country", he transcended race, color, religion and hatred, and turned from an indomitable fighter to a tolerant, philanthropic and tolerant practitioner. New South Africa has not been separated by historical feelings and hatred, and the African continent and even the world have benefited from it. The most fundamental reason why Mandela became Mandela is to forgive, tolerate and persevere. In the final analysis, it is to have a soft heart.
A soft heart is invincible and can overcome everything. This applies not only to politicians, but also to all fields.
The young Inamori Kazuo went to the temple with his father to visit a Taoist monk and ask about the way of life. The eminent monk is a very old and thin monk. He looked at Kazuo Inamori carefully and said to his father, the child doesn't need to ask. Go back and ask him to say "Nanman Nanman" more in the future. "Nanman Nanman" means "thank you" in Buddhist Zen. Since then, Inamori Kazuo has kept the words of the eminent monk in mind and really talks about "Nanman Nanman" every day.
Inamori Kazuo is not a smart man. He often fails junior high school, high school and university exams. He wanted to be a doctor, but he could only get a job in a ceramic factory. The factory was on the verge of closure and could not pay wages. The morale of the employees was low, and they often vented themselves by striking. All four college students who went with Inamori Kazuo resigned, but Inamori Kazuo stayed. He lived and ate in the laboratory, kept thinking, and simulated again and again in his mind. The things that only appeared in the dream gradually became clear, and finally the boundary between dream and reality disappeared. Unimaginable things happened: Kazuo Inamori, who had neither professional knowledge and skills, nor experience and equipment, made the world's leading invention, bringing vitality to the factory that was about to close down.
In 1959, he founded Kyocera company, a large high-tech enterprise based on precision ceramic technology, but Kazuo Inamori himself did not come from a technical background. At that time, there were only 8 people in the company, all of whom were professional and technical experts. One of them, Inoue, was an expert in this field. After the well came up, Inamori Kazuo gave him his car and office, and even made room for Inoue and six other people in his newly decorated home. He rented a small, old bungalow. Inamori said to Inoue, "I want to thank you for following me. I'm just a dreamer for Kyocera's future, and you are the real dreamer. It's not too big to dream, but it takes!" Inoue and the other six people were deeply moved by the boss' spirit of concession and sacrifice, and vowed to devote all their skills. Sure enough, with the help of Inoue and others, Kyocera became a world-famous listed company 10 years later.
We are all familiar with the later events. Kazuo Inamori founded the second Telecom at the age of 52. At present, it is the second largest communication company in Japan after Japan Telegraph and telephone company. He is known as the "Four Saints of operation" together with the founder of Panasonic, Yukiko Matsushita, the founder of Sony, Akio Morita, and the founder of Honda. It is enough to win the respect of the world if a person starts from scratch and can establish one of the world's top 500 companies in his whole life. In his 42 years of business career, Inamori Hefu has created two of the world's top 500 companies, but when he retires, he donated all his personal shares to his employees. He converted to Buddhism and went to pursue the highest wealth - refining his mind. The greatest secret of his success is to have an incomparably soft heart without him.

title: MCC Season 2 Launch with Artist 0x4evr!
body:
*Each week [RMX.PARTY](https://www.rmx.party/) sources a meme template for our caption contest. You, our community submit captions, and the winner gets a prize. Sometimes it’s ETH, sometimes it’s an NFT, and soon it’ll be a minted remix. It’s all a big experiment meant to be loads of fun while we iterate and test product ideas. This is the very beginning of our product story, and we’re writing it every week we learn, test and experiment. Our mission is to support creators and their audiences as they explore new forms of creation in web3. To that end, we also publish these weekly artist profiles. We hope you’ll join us on this journey, whether [here](https://mirror.xyz/rmxparty.eth), on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rmx_party), or on [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rmxparty/).*

## Contest 201

We’re in season two, week 1 (201) of our Meme Caption Contest (MCC). We took a pause to regroup, and come up with some fun ideas. First, we’re tightening our belts and launching the contest each week on **Tuesday at 12:00 PM ET. The contest will close 24 hours later on Wednesday at 11:59 AM ET.** We’ll announce the winner Wednesday afternoon. We’d like to ensure a regular cadence so you know when to tap your phone (or keyboard) and enter your wittiest captions. Season 2 Schedule

**Contest opens:** Tuesdays 12pm ET 

**Contest closes:** Wednesdays 11:59am ET

**Winners announced:** Wednesdays 5pm ET

What will you win? We’re giving each of our three favorite captions a super fun, specially designed, unique NFT. Each week will see different NFT prizes, NFTs that we hope the winners will hold to see their value increase over time. Another reason to hold them will be the  unique perks (e.g. special access to future product features, our server, merch and more fun stuff like a mix tapes.

The next thing we needed to do was find evocative, thought-provoking, and humor-worthy artwork. We scoured socials, and NFT sites like [Foundation](https://foundation.app/), [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/), and [Rarible](https://rarible.com/). We then reached out cold-call style, to artists. It was crickets 🦗. We don’t blame them though cause who reads the ‘other’ files of their Instagram inbox. Rather than wait more time for our next ten weeks of the contest, we decided to just buy some NFTs we thought would elicit great responses and hit go.

After we purchased, we were lucky enough to hear back from 0x4evr and we’re so excited to share their story with you!

## Let’s Learn About 0x4evr:

**RMX:** How do you like to be credited (i.e. do you prefer an alias or using your name?)
**PC:** I’m Preston Chaplin IRL but use the alias 0x4evr in the NFT space

**RMX:** When did you start creating? 
**PC:** 1996

**RMX:** Where do you find inspiration/stay inspired? 
**PC:** I find inspiration everywhere but I’m easily inspired by nature, lighting, people, social situations, and social callings. I store images and concepts that I find inspiring and revisit occasionally.

**RMX:** What does your creative workspace look like? (Screenshot of your desktop?)
**PC:**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7QF5naiwMbzDQ74JstE55.jpeg?height=3024&width=4032)

**RMX:** How do you describe your style of art in a single sentence?
**PC:** I’d say that I have a highly developed artistic vision coupled with extreme levels of technical aptitude and a strong compulsion to create.

**RMX:** How long did it take you to find your style of art and what was your journey?
**PC:** 26 years. I started in traditional photography in 1996, got into digital photography and 2D retouching soon after , then added 3D modeling and rendering to the skillset 10 years ago and software development around 5 years ago.

## The Featured Work:

[ethereum://0xf840988c0458ffb4147e30b4658C5678589BF932/8](ethereum://0xf840988c0458ffb4147e30b4658C5678589BF932/8)

**RMX:** Tell us about the meme template you created for RMX.PARTY - idea, process, origin?  
 **PC:** Indifferent Aliens is a collection of 1/1 photography and cgi composites that explores the concept that aliens are among us but they don't seem to be concerned with us or anything else really.

**RMX:** Do you have an affinity for memes? (likes, dislikes, etc…)  
**PC:** I love memes. Anything that makes people smile gains my respect.

## The NFT Landscape:

**RMX:** What excites you most about NFTs? 
**PC:** New creative outlet with endless possibilities

**RMX:** What are you most wary of in the land of NFTs? 
**PC:** There’s way too many scams and scammers

**RMX:** How can web3 better support artists and creators? 
**PC:** Increase sales for 1/1 artists

## 5 Quick Questions (One sentence answer max!):

**RMX:** What was the last show you binged and loved? 
**PC:** Stranger Things

**RMX:** What’s your favorite meal? 
**PC:** Pretty much any Mexican dish. I can’t get enough. The more authentic the better.

**RMX:** What was your favorite cartoon show growing up? 
**PC:** Road Runner

**RMX:** What was the last tab you had open? 
**PC:** https://mirror.xyz/rmxparty.eth

**RMX:** What music do you have on repeat right now?
**PC:** Cinematic Love by Duo

Thanks agan to 0x4evr for sharing a little bit about their process and this incredible NFT!
